attributes.action: demonstrate that the petitions petitions.pm.gov.uk site are taken into account in policy making.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Responses to the petitions on this site are overwhelmingly along the lines of "we're doing the right thing, only you're just not aware of it"? 

We petitioners request that the Prime Minister make it clear to all what effect these petitions have on government policy, by publishing detailed information on how the views of petitioners are taken into account in the government.

rejection.details: Comments or questions about the petitions system should be sent to team@petitions.pm.gov.uk.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
